__e: I designed the machine to detect acts of terror, but, it sees everything.
I designed the machine to detect acts of terror, but it sees everything... violent crimes involving ordinary people.
Remember, I found a way to track the Protector but she shut us down...
I know that he's helping you track down Bob and Carol, but he has his own issues to deal with.
Well, the call wasn't long enough to trace, but there is something going on here.
We tried tracking your friend down, but he's gone.
Then he tells me if they don't want to play ball, he knows enough about computers to track down the people behind the agency, and identify them to the police.
Yeah. Because he asked me to track you down and put a bullet in your brain.
So, what we're going to do, ladies and gents, is sniff out this bastard, then show him and the rest of the world that no one can do this to us.
